title: The Science of winning
brief_description: This film shows specialists at the Australian Institute of Sport in Canberra working elite athletes, applying the processes of physiology, biochemistry, biomechanics and psychology. This is a thought-provoking document about the development of our systematic scientific approach to sports training.
